title: Anatomy of the lowercase I and J
content:
Hey, I am very new to typography and I am doing an assignment where we have to label different parts of the letter. I want to label the dot of the I, but I cannot find the term for that piece of the letter.

If anyone knows it would be of great appreciation, thank you  
Nicole
author: ncharshaf

comments.content:
[Is there a term to describe the dot in a lowercase "i" ?](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017001131/http:/typophile.com/node/19054)

Try using the _Search_ next time :^)
